title: Evaluation of Public Health Emergency Management in China: A Systematic Review
text:
China's comprehensive promotion of health infrastructure construction requires improvement of disaster prevention, mitigation/emergency response capabilities, and improvement of the emergency health emergency response system
Health emergency management assessment is a process of formulating objective judgments on assessment targets based on specific criteria
authors: Wang, Jia; Yuan, Beibei; Li, Zhengmao; Wang, Zhifeng

title: Establishment of CDC Global Rapid Response Team to Ensure Global Health Security
text: CDC response mechanisms can be further improved through continued coordination with agency emergency response personnel and streamlined mobilization processes
authors: Stehling-Ariza, Tasha; Lefevre, Adrienne; Calles, Dinorah; Djawe, Kpandja; Garfield, Richard; Gerber, Michael; Ghiselli, Margherita; Giese, Coralie; Greiner, Ashley L.; Hoffman, Adela; Miller, Leigh Ann; Moorhouse, Lisa; Navarro-Colorado, Carlos; Walsh, James; Bugli, Dante; Shahpar, Cyrus

title: The evidence base of primary research in public health emergency preparedness: a scoping review and stakeholder consultation
text: Emergency preparedness research focused on all aspects of the emergency management cycle (prevention/mitigation, preparedness, response and recovery) was considered
authors: Khan, Yasmin; Fazli, Ghazal; Henry, Bonnie; de Villa, Eileen; Tsamis, Charoula; Grant, Moira; Schwartz, Brian

title: Regulatory Underpinnings of Global Health Security: FDA's Roles in Preventing, Detecting, and Responding to Global Health Threats
text:
The mitigation of emerging and ongoing public health emergency threats often requires the use of MCMs
Legal and regulatory authorizations to facilitate MCM product availability are also vital to early mitigation of disease outbreaks and other public health threats
authors: Courtney, Brooke; Bond, Katherine C.; Maher, Carmen

title: Surveillance, response systems, and evidence updates on emerging zoonoses: the role of one health
text: Emerging zoonoses causes serious health threats and global economical losses
authors: Asokan, G. V.; Kasimanickam, Ramanathan K.; Asokan, Vanitha

title: Communications in Public Health Emergency Preparedness: A Systematic Review of the Literature
text: It helps mitigate the risks, supports the implementation of protective actions, and contributes to minimizing negative mental health impacts of disasters
authors: Savoia, Elena; Lin, Leesa; Viswanath, Kasisomayajula
